Colombia: Death of indigenous leader Cacique Calarcá in combats against the Spanish forces in Peñas Blancas
France: Louis XVI visits Cherbourg to see the construction site of the dam and the arsenal.
India: District collectors in Bengal were made responsible for settling the revenue and collecting it.
Taiwan: Lin Shuangwen rebellion: Ling Shuangwen rebels and takes over Zhanghua
Individuals whose relatives are already in Taiwan are allowed to emigrate
Vietnam: The Phú Xuân Campaign (1786) took place.
The Thăng Long Campaign took place.
